heading: HR00321
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, DIRECT THE GRID MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE THROUGH THE ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION TO REVIEW THE EXISTING OPEN ACCESS TRANSMISSION SERVICE RULES PARTICULARLY ON THE ISSUE OF IMPOSING PENALTIES TO VIOLATORS THEREOF
